casebody.data:
Mary E. Burns, an Infant, &c., Respondent, v. William E. Dodge, et al., Appellants. Decided April 7, 1886. Appeal from order allowing plaintiff to sue as a poor person, &c. Edmund Coffin, Jr., for appellants. Hugh Coleman, for respondent.

Before Sedgwick, Ch. J. and O’Gorman, J.

Opinion per Curiam. Order affirmed, without costs.
